name: Champions of Haverton: Prologue
description:
Champions of Haverton: Prologue is a short single player turn-based fantasy RPG. Elementals have destroyed the world of Trylle and its various other races have gathered in the last safe region known as the Western March. Here they have halted the tide of elementals for now, allowing a couple of fringe settlements to enjoy a temporary peace.

The player is a captain in the March Legion who accepts a position at one such quiet town. You've traveled from the front lines and arrived in the town of Haverton in the evening. After a brief tour you were able to finally rest. However it seems the town's elders have decided to put you to work early. This is where your story begins...

Here you are presented with a simple task and must choose your party to venture forth. However your choices will have consequences. 

Champions of Haverton: Prologue features:

-Two player characters to choose from

-Six companions, up to three of which can be active at one time

-Unlockable dialogue with your party through completing battles

-Several areas to explore including Haverton and a nearby Farm

-A couple of short side quests

-Multiple endings depending on your choices and actions

Average playtime is typically around 30-60 minutes.
